regen.absent_element: reverting to default settings after scheduled period ends
regen.new_specification: After the scheduled time or manual setting period ends, the thermostat shall revert to its default setting.

regen.absent_element: handling conflicts between manual and scheduled settings
regen.new_specification: If a scheduled setting is due to take effect during the persistence of a manual setting, the system shall prompt the user to decide whether to override the manual setting or defer the scheduled change until the manual setting period expires.

regen.absent_element: reverting to an explicit default temperature when manual settings end
regen.new_specification: When a manual temperature setting ends, the thermostat shall revert to a predefined default temperature setting.

label: When a manual temperature setting ends, the default setting will be used for the next time period.
absence: using the default setting after a manual temperature setting ends
